frame.name: Temporary_leave
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Person</fen> takes leave from his or her routine <fen>Activity</fen> (such as work or school) for a <fen>Duration</fen> of time. The <fen>Duration</fen> can be any length of time, as long as the absence is temporary.
<ex></ex> <ex>The claimant should then submit medical certificates for the duration of <fex name="Person">their</fex> <t>absence</t> <fex name="Act">from work</fex>.<fex name="Dur">INI</fex></ex> <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Person">He</fex> <m>took</m> <fex name="Dur">three month's</fex> <t>leave</t> and went to our world assembly at Caux. <fex name="Act">DNI</fex></ex> <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Person">Negroponte</fex>, <fex name="Person">who</fex> is <m>on</m> a <fex name="Dur">two-year</fex> <t>leave</t> <t>of</t> <t>absence</t> <fex name="Act">from MIT</fex>, decided to stay on to the end of the present academic year.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Person
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person who is absent from his or her <fen>Activity</fen> for a <fen>Duration</fen> of time.
<ex>During his <fex name="Person">wife's</fex> <t>absence</t>, Linkworth and his mother had another violent argument.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Person">Lemaire</fex> <m>took</m> a <t>sabbatical</t> from the club.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE describes the activity or responsiblilities from which the <fen>Person</fen> is taking a temporary leave.
<ex>Such conditions would be likely to lead to <t>absence</t> <fex name="Act">from work</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The amount of time the <fen>Person</fen> is absent from his or her <fen>Activity</fen>. This can also be expressed as a description of a duration, as shown below:
<ex>Dissuaded from resigning, Macmillan took <fex name="Dur">extended</fex> <t>leave</t> rather than restrain his public utterances.</ex>
<ex>During her <fex name="Dur">two-year</fex> <t>absence</t> Eliza suffered great pangs of homesickness and longing for her children.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition:
<def-root>The place in which the <fen>Person</fen> spends his or her leave.
<ex>Chris read many books while on <t>sabbatical</t> <fex name="Loc">in Spain</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition:
<def-root>The kind of leave being taken by the <fen>Person</fen>.
<ex>She's been on <fex name="Type">maternity</fex> <t>leave</t> for a while.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characterization of the absence.
<ex>After a <fex name="Dep">mysterious</fex> five-year <t>absence</t> from his tribe, Smohalla had returned.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition:
<def-root>How often the absences occur.
<ex>Laura's <fex name="Freq">frequent</fex> <t>absences</t> in London meant that her baby, Emma, was often left behind with Gwenny. </ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for the <fen>Person</fen>'s absence.
<ex>Ukraine's <t>absence</t> from the negotiations <fex name="exp">because of the forthcoming referendum on independence</fex>, had made the signing of a Union Treaty unlikely.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Person</fen>'s intended purpose for the temporary leave.
<ex>Mark Morrow will replace Ben Bradlee Jr., who is <m>taking</m> a <t>leave</t> <fex name="Pur">to write a book</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the leave occurs.
<ex>Columbus took <t>leave</t> of the known world <fex name="Time">on 6 September 1492</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

lexUnit.name: absence.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a missed responsibility or duty, usually referring to a work day or school period

lexUnit.name: leave.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a temporary period of time in which someone is away

lexUnit.name: sabbatical.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an extended period of time away, taken by an employee, which is sometimes paid partially or fully by the employer

lexUnit.name: leave of absence.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a period of time in which an employee is temporarily away from work

lexUnit.name: vacation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a period of time spent away from work or school

lexUnit.name: holiday.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a period of time spent away from work or school

lexUnit.name: furlough.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a period of time spent away from work; a leave of absence

lexUnit.name: time off.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a period of time spent away from everyday responsibilities

lexUnit.name: PTO.n
lexUnit.definition: paid time off; a period of time spent away from work with pay

lexUnit.name: absent.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to remove oneself from an activity or location for a period of time
